data.title: 2016 Trofeo Estate Amphora
data.description: This Mornington Peninsula grown Sauvignon Blanc has been 100% fermented and matured in Florentine Terracotta Amphorae. Passionfruit, ripe lychees and pineapple dominate on both the aroma and palate. A smooth, soft mouthfeel and refreshing crisp acidity unite to create a youthful, fruity wine that will quench any thirst.
data.method: This cool climate Sauvignon Blanc has been 100% fermented and aged in Florentine Terracotta Amphorae.
